alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 5:02PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Otero, southwestern Kiowa, eastern Crowley and northwestern Bent Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 501 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 8 miles northwest of Las Animas, or 14 miles northeast of North La Junta, moving southeast at 20 mph. Spotters did report a broadly rotating wall cloud. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Las Animas, Cheraw, John Martin Reservoir and Fort Lyon. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
